# Introduction

Several R packages deal with DAGs and causal inference. Perhaps most notable are `ggdag`, `dagitty`, `dagR`, and `causaleffect`. This article explains the ecosystem of R DAG packages, and positions `DAGassist` within it.

```{r setup}
library(DAGassist)
```
